verses.verse: Therefore <WG3767> having been justified <WG1344> by faith, <WG4102> we have <WG2192> peace <WG1515> with God <WG2316> through <WG1223> our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547>

through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> we have obtained <WG2192> our introduction <WG4318> by faith <WG4102> into this <WG3778> grace <WG5485> in which <WG3739> we stand; <WG2476> and we exult <WG2744> in hope <WG1680> of the glory <WG1391> of God. <WG2316>
And not only <WG3440> this, but we also <WG2532> exult <WG2744> in our tribulations, <WG2347> knowing <WG3609> that tribulation <WG2347> brings <WG2716> about <WG2716> perseverance; <WG5281>
and perseverance, <WG5281> proven <WG1382> character; <WG1382> and proven <WG1382> character, <WG1382> hope; <WG1680>

and hope <WG1680> does not disappoint, <WG2617> because <WG3754> the love <WG26> of God <WG2316> has been poured <WG7062> out within <WG1722> our hearts <WG2588> through <WG1223> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> who was given <WG1325> to us.
For while we were still <WG2089> helpless, <WG772> at the right <WG2540> time <WG2540> Christ <WG5547> died <WG599> for the ungodly. <WG765>

For one <WG5100> will hardly <WG3433> die <WG599> for a righteous <WG1342> man; <WG1342> though <WG1063> perhaps <WG5029> for the good <WG18> man <WG18> someone <WG5100> would dare <WG5111> even <WG2532> to die. <WG599>
But God <WG2316> demonstrates <WG4921> His own <WG1438> love <WG26> toward <WG1519> us, in that while we were yet <WG2089> sinners, <WG268> Christ <WG5547> died <WG599> for us.
Much <WG4183> more <WG3123> then, <WG3767> having now <WG3568> been justified <WG1344> by His blood, <WG129> we shall be saved <WG4982> from the wrath <WG3709> [of God] through <WG1223> Him.

For if <WG1487> while we were enemies, <WG2190> we were reconciled <WG2644> to God <WG2316> through <WG1223> the death <WG2288> of His Son, <WG5207> much <WG4183> more, <WG3123> having been reconciled, <WG2644> we shall be saved <WG4982> by His life. <WG2222>

And not only <WG3440> this, but we also <WG2532> exult <WG2744> in God <WG2316> through <WG1223> our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> we have now <WG3568> received <WG2983> the reconciliation. <WG2643>

Therefore, <WG1223> <WG3778> just <WG5618> as through <WG1223> one <WG1520> man <WG444> sin <WG266> entered <WG1525> into the world, <WG2889> and death <WG2288> through <WG1223> sin, <WG266> and so <WG3779> death <WG2288> spread <WG1330> to all <WG3956> men, <WG444> because <WG1909> <WG3739> all <WG3956> sinned <WG264> â€“
for until <WG891> the Law <WG3551> sin <WG266> was in the world; <WG2889> but sin <WG266> is not imputed <WG1677> when there is no <WG3361> law. <WG3551>

Nevertheless <WG235> death <WG2288> reigned <WG936> from Adam <WG76> until <WG3360> Moses, <WG3475> even <WG2532> over <WG1909> those <WG3588> who had not sinned <WG264> in the likeness <WG3667> of the offense <WG3847> of Adam, <WG76> who <WG3739> is a type <WG5179> of Him who was to come. <WG3195>

But the free <WG5486> gift <WG5486> is not like <WG5613> the transgression. <WG3900> For if <WG1487> by the transgression <WG3900> of the one <WG1520> the many <WG4183> died, <WG599> much <WG4183> more <WG3123> did the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> and the gift <WG1431> by the grace <WG5485> of the one <WG1520> Man, <WG444> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> abound <WG4052> to the many. <WG4183>

And the gift <WG1434> is not like <WG5613> [that which came] through <WG1223> the one <WG1520> who sinned; <WG264> for on the one <WG3303> hand <WG3303> the judgment <WG2917> [arose] from one <WG1520> [transgression] resulting <WG1519> in condemnation, <WG2631> but on the other <WG1161> hand <WG1161> the free <WG5486> gift <WG5486> [arose] from many <WG4183> transgressions <WG3900> resulting <WG1519> in justification. <WG1345>

For if <WG1487> by the transgression <WG3900> of the one, <WG1520> death <WG2288> reigned <WG936> through <WG1223> the one, <WG1520> much <WG4183> more <WG3123> those <WG3588> who receive <WG2983> the abundance <WG4050> of grace <WG5485> and of the gift <WG1431> of righteousness <WG1343> will reign <WG936> in life <WG2222> through <WG1223> the One, <WG1520> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

So <WG686> then <WG686> as through <WG1223> one <WG1520> transgression <WG3900> there resulted <WG1519> condemnation <WG2631> to all <WG3956> men, <WG444> even <WG2532> so <WG3779> through <WG1223> one <WG1520> act <WG1345> of righteousness <WG1345> there resulted <WG1519> justification <WG1347> of life <WG2222> to all <WG3956> men. <WG444>

For as through <WG1223> the one <WG1520> man's disobedience <WG3876> the many <WG4183> were made <WG2525> sinners, <WG268> even <WG2532> so <WG3779> through <WG1223> the obedience <WG5218> of the One <WG1520> the many <WG4183> will be made <WG2525> righteous. <WG1342>

And the Law <WG3551> came <WG3922> in that the transgression <WG3900> might increase; <WG4121> but where <WG3757> sin <WG266> increased, <WG4121> grace <WG5485> abounded <WG5248> all <WG5248> the more, <WG5248>

that, as sin <WG266> reigned <WG936> in death, <WG2288> even <WG2532> so <WG3779> grace <WG5485> might reign <WG936> through <WG1223> righteousness <WG1343> to eternal <WG166> life <WG2222> through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our Lord. <WG2962>
